page.title: 02NEWCOMERS TO BRACKNELL.
page.content:
{Bracknell}was developed as a New Town to take families from London. People live in{NEIGHBOURHOODS}round the town. Crown Wood and Forest Park are the two latest Neighbourhoods to be built.
{Crown Wood School}opened 2.5 years ago, in January 1983. At that time there were only 49 children and now there are 218.
We are organised into vertically grouped{Home Bases.} 'Vertical grouping' means that there is more than one age group in each Home Base.
In my Home Base there are 31 of us and only one child has a parent who was born in Bracknell. Nineteen in the Home Base moved to Bracknell after they were born.
